    OSSCamp 10.11

    About OSSCamp(s) OSScamp is a series of community driven un-­conferences specifically targeted at the promotion of Free and Open Source Software(FOSS) implementation and development in India. It binds over 1500 students and IT professionals into a community which enthusiastically participates to learn, contribute and promote FOSS. This community and the [...]
